feed.title: Status Technikon Blog
feed.subtitle: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest Status Technikon news and events.

entry.title: TECH TALK: The Road to ULC
Datasets By Status
entry.summary: There have been two initiatives recently to gather data from the Ethereum community in the form of text-based questions and interviews. Status has also been doing a lot of UX research and gathering all kinds of user data.

entry.title: Status Communication Protocol Changes
entry.summary: For the last year, Status has been focussed on research and development of the core protocols that make up Ethereum, especially Whisper - the "dark", peer-to-peer, end-to-end encrypted messaging protocol. We have worked with various people to bring Whisper from v2 to v5 and now v6, both of which show great performance and reliability improvements, without compromising on the original vision of a truly decentralized chat protocol.
